Log-likelihood test for comparing terms in ASreml-R models

Source: R/logltest.R
logl.test.Rd

Log-likelihood test for comparing terms in ASreml-R models

logl.test(model.obj, rand.terms = NULL, resid.terms = NULL)

Arguments

model.obj

An ASreml-R model object
rand.terms

Random terms from the model. Default is NULL.
resid.terms

Residual terms from the model. Default is NULL.

Value

A dataframe containing the results of the test.

Details

Uses the asremlPlus::REMLRT.asreml() function to calculate the Likelihood ratio test for Asreml-R objects.

Examples

if (FALSE) {
library(agridat)
dat <- yates.oats
dat$row <- factor(dat$row)
dat$col <- factor(dat$col)
dat$nitro <- factor(dat$nitro)
dat$mplot <- factor(as.numeric(dat$gen))
dat <- dat[order(dat$row, dat$col), ]
library(asreml)
dat.asr <- asreml(yield ~ gen + nitro + gen:nitro,
  random = ~ block + block:mplot,
  residual = ~ ar1(row):id(col), data = dat
)
oats.logl <- logl.test(
  model.obj = dat.asr, rand.terms = c("block", "block:mplot"),
  resid.terms = c("ar1(row)")
)
oats.logl
}
